John, I can work around on my side if this can't be fixed in job manager.

IJobManager.transferRule explicitly says that transferring to the same thread
has on effect, so this should be fixed in core.

Fixed.  As recommended I have changed the order of the assertion checking.  It
should tolerate switching to the same thread.  Regression test added:
IJobManagerTest#testTransferSameThread.

John, will this go into tomorrows rebuild I have requested ? The problem
prevents deletion in the Java Browsing perspective.
The fix has been tagged and released for the next integration build.
